title: Powell Memo: Psychological Warfare Tactics Applied to Economic Policy
summary: Lewis Powell drafts confidential memo to the US Chamber of Commerce outlining a systematic strategy for corporate influence, drawing from psychological manipulation techniques similar to those developed in MKULTRA. The memo provides a blueprint for coordinated institutional capture through media, politics, and academic institutions.

sources.title: The Powell Memo: Corporate Blueprint for Dominating American Democracy
